resources: Pedia Animals Search Welcome To Pedia Animals //profil Name : Hairul Azmi NIM : 180201010 Major : Information System //layout List of Breeds Cow Dove Turtle List of Cow Breeds List of Dove Breeds List of Turtle Breeds //data sapi Angus Scotland The characteristic of this cow is dark black skin so its name is easy to remember as Angus cow because in Indonesian Angus = charred. Holstein Europe Holstein cow or Frisia is one of the dairy cattle breeds which is now known as the cow that produces the most milk in dairy farms. Hereford United Kingdom Hereford cattle are a type of beef cattle originating from areas with a subtropical climate. Simmental Switzerland Simmental has reddish fur with white markings, and is bred for milk and meat. Limousin French Sapi limousin merupakan tipe sapi potong dengan perototan yang lebih baik dari Sapi Simmental. Galloway Scotland The Galloway is one of the longest beef cattle breeds in the world, named after the Galloway region of Scotland, where it originated, in the 17th century.. //data merpati Modena Italy Has a fat body shape and round. In addition, the tail is short, which is about 25 cm. Jacobin India The most prominent feature of this breed is the fur that is around the head to the neck shaped like a coat (Jacob).. Brongsong Indonesia The characteristics of a large body, a wide crest and spread from the head to the cheeks, while the legs do not have hair. Wulung Indonesia Called the wulung because this dove has a color motif that is exactly the same as the wulung eagle / bondol eagle. Satinette Oriental Frill Turkey The most prominent feature of this breed is the inverted hair from the neck to the chest, and there is also a crest on the head. //data kura-kura Red Ear Slider Brazil As the name implies, his trademark is the red color on his ears. Leopard Africa The attraction of this turtle is in the pattern on its shell which is like a squiggle on the skin of a leopard. Spurred Africa These turtles are in great demand by many people when they are small. When mature, the length of the spurred tortoise can reach 60 to 90 cm. Radiated Madagascar This tortoise has a very striking pattern, and this tortoise belongs to the endangered tortoise class. Sulcata Africa This yellowish tortoise lives in desert climates and can adapt to tropical climates. Aldabra Seychelles The characteristics of this turtle are dark colors, inconspicuous patterns, necks that can be elongated and can grow to a length of 1.2 meters.
